actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 9, 1965.

summary.text: Amends Federal law with respect to concessions for public accommodations, facilities, and services in areas administered by the National Park Service to make franchise fees collected pursuant to such law available for appropriation to the National Park Service for restoration and improvement of National Park System units and facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 9, 1965.
